title: VNC Chat
author: Lelic
body_snippet:
<!--
Only file GitHub issues for bugs and feature requests.  All other topics will be closed.

Before opening an issue, please search for a duplicate or closed issue.
Please provide as much detail as possible for us to fix your issue.
-->

<!-- Bug -->
||Doesn't work VNC chat. Ultra VNC server on remote comuter is 1.2.1.2. Native client works correctly.|
|--:|---|
|Operating system | Windows 7 x64 |
|mRemoteNG version| 1.75 aplha 3  |

iterations.description: VNC Chat is an obscure legacy VNC feature with no implementation details provided, out of scope for mRemoteNG which is a connection manager not a VNC server/client implementation

notes:
AI triage: VNC Chat is an obscure legacy VNC feature with no implementation details provided, out of scope for mRemoteNG which is a connection manager not a VNC server/client implementation
Approach: No action needed - VNC chat is a rarely-used protocol feature that would require significant VNC client library changes and is outside the scope of a connection manager
